explains: adj. 令人心烦意乱的，令人苦恼的
n. 缩锻，镦锻；倾复，倒转
wordGroup: upsetting machine 杆端锻粗机；镦粗机；锻头机；顶锻机

sentences.en: She was afraid of upsetting her parents.
sentences.cn: 她担心会使她父母不安。

sentences.en: She stood up suddenly, upsetting a glass of wine.
sentences.cn: 她蓦然起身，碰倒了一杯酒。

sentences.en: We risk upsetting the ecological balance of the area.
sentences.cn: 我们有可能破坏这个地区的生态平衡。
